long_description: Designed for kids weighing 50 - 90 lbs., the low-profile eSCAPE Youth PFD from Stohlquist offers your child essential safety and comfort. Soft, buoyant foam hugs body in front and back, and its low-profile contour provides an excellent fit. Breathable and quick-drying 200-denier nylon oxford shell is soft on skin and tough to scuff up. Side straps adjust with a forward pull to prevent ride up, and quick release buckle at waist belt makes it easy to get into PFD. Front pocket is perfect for holding sunscreen or snacks, and it expands to hold a beverage can. Reflective tape on front and back enhances visibility. The Stohlquist eSCAPE Youth PFD includes padded adjustable shoulders, a 4-way lash tab and double stitching throughout.
short_description: Designed for kids weighing 50 - 90 lbs., the low-profile eSCAPE Youth PFD from Stohlquist offers your child essential safety and comfort.
